timeline.bodyText: You can put return getAllFilterPredicates(calc, mq, condition); in the if conditiion.

Thanks.

timeline.bodyText:
How about just use rel, not rel.getInput(0) ?
And add the doc, the pred comes from the parent of rel.
timeline.author: yanlin-Lynn

replies.bodyText: rel used in getAllFilterPredicates rather than only used for getInput().
